title: feat : [development added streak and task completion dates columns to taskitem table.
message:
feat : [development added streak and task completion dates columns to taskitem table.
         -Alarm receiver to run at 12:00 am daily to update the count, streak, isToday, isFinished columns.
         -Implemented custom calenderview to show list of dates when the task was completed.
         -BottomDialogFragment to display dates list.
         -ListFragment toggle problem solved by using togglebutton and running the drawable manipulation on backgorund thread.
         -added validations in EditText for adding new list and editing new list.
         -moved the code to dialogfragment for adding and editing list. Swipe to dismiss scraped.]
  : (MVP not ready.)

title: feat : modified Content Provider to display only the item that are included today.
message:
feat : modified Content Provider to display only the item that are included today.

  - Made changes on URI matcher to include matcher for including today's tasks.
  - For TodayTaskFragment there are changes on query builder for content resolver.
  - UpdateProgressTasks was populating dummy data on firebase, instead proper finished and isToday information is passed there.
